content.question: The Second Great Awakening was most directly related to which of the following other historical developments of the early nineteenth century?

choices.label: Innovations in manufacturing technology and agricultural equipment
Opposing political views on the powers of the federal government
Celebrations of American patriotism and national culture
Challenges to Enlightenment views of rationalism

content.answer: Challenges to Enlightenment views of rationalism

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
